text: Mubashir Hassan (; 22 January 1922 â€“ 14 March 2020) was a Pakistani socialist politician. He was the Finance Minister of Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto government from 1971 to 1974. He was born in Panipat, British India. Hassan died in Lahore, Pakistan on 14 March 2020 at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Lahore
title: Mubashir Hassan
